articles.author: Ryan Browne
articles.title: Netflix is planning a 'Squid Game' reality show with a record $4.56 million cash prize - CNBC
articles.description: It will see 456 players compete in a series of games inspired by the show.
articles.content:
Netflix is doing "Squid Game" for real (without any of the blood and gore).
The streaming platform has approved a reality TV series called "Squid Game: The Challenge," which will pit 456 contestants… [+1524 chars]
